translation.en: [Bill Basch] There is one thing that has puzzled me, and has puzzled the world…
translation.it: C'è una cosa che mi lascia perplesso e che ha lasciato perplesso il mondo…

translation.en: that the Germans dedicated manpower
translation.it: che i tedeschi abbiano impiegato uomini,

translation.en: and trains and trucks and energy
translation.it: treni, camion ed energia

translation.en: towards the destruction of the Jews to the last day.
translation.it: per distruggere gli ebrei fino all'ultimo giorno.

translation.en: Had they stopped six months before the end of the war and dedicated that energy
translation.it: Se si fossero fermati sei mesi prima dalla fine della guerra, e avessero impiegato tutta quell'energia per rinforzarsi,

translation.en: towards strengthening themselves,
translation.it: e avessero impiegato tutta quell'energia per rinforzarsi,

translation.en: they may have carried on the war a little longer.
translation.it: avrebbero potuto resistere più a lungo.

translation.en: But it was more important to them to kill the Jews
translation.it: Ma per loro era più importante uccidere gli ebrei

translation.en: than even winning the war.
translation.it: che vincere la guerra.

translation.en: [Irene Zisblatt] I grew up in a town called Polyana, in the Carpathian mountains.
translation.it: Sono cresciuta in un paese di nome Polyana, sui monti Carpazi.

translation.en: It was a small town of two main streets.
translation.it: Era un piccolo paese con due strade principali.

translation.en: This leads all the way up to… There is a church over there…
translation.it: Questa conduce a… C'è una chiesa laggiù…

translation.en: We had a post office and a town hall and a church and a synagogue.
translation.it: C'erano un ufficio postale, il municipio, una chiesa e una sinagoga.

translation.en: Everybody knew each other.
translation.it: Ci conoscevamo tutti.

translation.en: It was beautiful.
translation.it: Era bellissimo.

translation.en: [Renee Firestone] I lived in a town called Uzhhorod.
translation.it: Io abitavo in un paese chiamato Uzhorod.

translation.en: It was a small town,
translation.it: Era un piccola cittadina,

translation.en: yet it had the feel of a big, cosmopolitan town.
translation.it: ma aveva l'aria di una grande città cosmopolita.

translation.en: Right here was a little deli, right around… right here, and, uh…
translation.it: Qui c'era una bottega di alimentari, dietro a… Proprio qui. E…

translation.en: My… We used to come here to have our sandwiches for the afternoon.
translation.it: Venivamo qui il pomeriggio a mangiare panini.

translation.en: [Alice Lok Cahana] We lived in a town called Sárvár.
translation.it: Noi vivevamo in un paese di nome Sárvár.

translation.en: It's in Hungary, close to the, um, Austrian border.
translation.it: È in Ungheria, vicino al confine austriaco.

translation.en: Every day, the peasants would bring their wares from the neighboring villages
translation.it: Ogni giorno, i contadini portavano i loro prodotti dai villaggi limitrofi

translation.en: in big baskets, and they would carry it on their head or on their shoulders.
translation.it: in grandi ceste che portavano sulla testa o sulle spalle.

translation.en: Szaszovo was a very small, little community
translation.it: Szaszovo era una piccola comunità

translation.en: consisting of 3,000 people.
translation.it: di 3.000 persone.

translation.en: No electricity, no utilities at all.
translation.it: Non c'era elettricità, né servizi.

translation.en: So it was… I lead a very simplistic, boring life. Nothing exciting.
translation.it: La mia era una vita molto semplice, noiosa. Niente di eccitante.

translation.en: But then Budapest, where I ended up, was an entirely different life.
translation.it: Ma a Budapest, dove poi mi trasferii, la mia vita cambiò drasticamente.

translation.en: It was an enormous adjustment.
translation.it: Fu un enorme cambiamento.

translation.en: And I looked at this city just going, "Whoa!"
translation.it: Guardavo la città e pensavo: "Wow!"

translation.en: I mean, it was like… I've never believed anything like this exists!
translation.it: Insomma, non pensavo potesse esistere un posto del genere!

translation.en: [Tom Lantos] Budapest was a magnificent, world-class city,
translation.it: Budapest era una stupenda città di livello mondiale,

translation.en: on par with Vienna or Paris or London as a great European capital.
translation.it: alla pari di Vienna, Parigi o Londra come grande capitale europea.

translation.en: This magnificent Parliament building
translation.it: Questo magnifico palazzo del Parlamento

translation.en: saw the best and the worst in Hungarian history.
translation.it: ha visto il meglio e il peggio della storia ungherese.

translation.en: The bulk of the Jews in Budapest
translation.it: Gli ebrei di Budapest erano perlopiù

translation.en: were utterly assimilated, deeply patriotic,
translation.it: totalmente integrati, profondamente patriottici

translation.en: and enormously proud of their Hungarian cultural heritage.
translation.it: e assolutamente orgogliosi della loro eredità culturale ungherese.

translation.en: There were about 800 Jewish families in our town.
translation.it: C'erano circa 800 famiglie di ebrei nel nostro paese,

translation.en: And I think the town was 10,000 or 11,000 non-Jews.
translation.it: e credo che ci fossero 10.000 o 11.000 non ebrei.

translation.en: I had non-Jewish friends. I dated non-Jewish boys.
translation.it: Avevo amici non ebrei. Uscivo con ragazzi non ebrei.

translation.en: My parents had non-Jewish friends.
translation.it: I miei genitori avevano amici non ebrei.

translation.en: We also felt quite Hungarian at the same time.
translation.it: Allo stesso tempo, ci sentivamo anche molto ungheresi.

translation.en: Not just Jewish.
translation.it: Non solo ebrei.

translation.en: So, Judaism was our religion,
translation.it: Il giudaismo era la nostra religione,

translation.en: but we were Hungarians.
translation.it: ma noi eravamo ungheresi.

translation.en: [reporter 1] On August 2nd, 1934, officers and men swear the oath of allegiance
translation.it: Il 2 agosto del 1934, ufficiali e uomini giurano fedeltà

translation.en: not to Germany, but to Hitler personally.
translation.it: non alla Germania, ma a Hitler personalmente.

translation.en: [reporter 2] As Hitler's rule over Germany became absolute,
translation.it: Mentre affermava il suo dominio assoluto sulla Germania,

translation.en: to his alarmed neighbor Austria,
translation.it: ai preoccupati vicini austriaci

translation.en: Hitler promised to keep hands off.
translation.it: Hitler promise che li avrebbe lasciati in pace.

translation.en: [Tom Lantos] In 1938, when I was 10 years old,
translation.it: Nel 1938, quando avevo dieci anni,

translation.en: I bought my first newspaper.
translation.it: comprai il mio primo giornale

translation.en: And I saw the headlines,
translation.it: e vidi i titoli:

translation.en: "Hitler marches into Austria."
translation.it: "Hitler marcia sull'Austria."

translation.en: And I sensed that this historic moment
translation.it: E intuii che quel particolare momento storico

translation.en: will have a tremendous impact on the lives of Hungarian Jews, my family, and myself.
translation.it: avrebbe avuto un enorme impatto sulla vita degli ebrei ungheresi, sulla mia famiglia e su di me.

translation.en: [reporter 3] Germany invades Poland and Danzig.
translation.it: La Germania invade la Polonia e Danzica,

translation.en: Warsaw is bombed, blasted and shelled.
translation.it: Varsavia è bombardata, minata e devastata.

translation.en: Poland is in ruins.
translation.it: La Polonia è ridotta in macerie.

translation.en: [Renee Firestone] There were refugees coming to Hungary running away from Poland,
translation.it: C'erano rifugiati che venivano in Ungheria in fuga dalla Polonia

translation.en: and most of the Jewish families, Friday night the men went to temple
translation.it: e in molte famiglie ebree, il venerdì sera gli uomini andavano al tempio

translation.en: to bring these people home and give them shelter.
translation.it: per offrire rifugio a queste persone.

translation.en: They would come and tell stories.
translation.it: Venivano e ci raccontavano storie.

translation.en: And I remembered very often…
translation.it: E ricordo che spesso…

translation.en: you didn't believe them.
translation.it: non ci credevamo.

translation.en: I heard a conversation between my father and another man.
translation.it: Sentii un uomo raccontare a mio padre

translation.en: And he was telling my father what the Nazis are doing in Poland.
translation.it: quello che i nazisti stavano facendo in Polonia.

translation.en: And one thing that I'll never forget that I heard…
translation.it: E sentii una cosa che non dimenticherò mai…

translation.en: And he said the Nazis are taking our young Jewish infants,
translation.it: Disse che i nazisti prendevano i neonati ebrei

translation.en: and they're tearing them in half by their legs,
translation.it: e li squartavano in due tirandoli per le gambe

translation.en: and they're throwing them in the Dniester, a river in the Ukraine.
translation.it: per poi gettarli nel Dniester, un fiume dell'Ucraina.

translation.en: Then later, of course,
translation.it: Poi col tempo, ovviamente,

translation.en: the stories were getting worse,
translation.it: le storie peggioravano,

translation.en: and we began to hear about mass shootings and mass graves,
translation.it: e iniziammo a sentir parlare di uccisioni di massa e di fosse comuni.

translation.en: But there was a sort of a naive…
translation.it: Ma c'era una sorta di ingenuo…

translation.en: I hate to use the word, but I have to use the word…
translation.it: Odio usare questa parola, ma devo farlo…

translation.en: patriotic feeling that we Hungarians don't do such things.
translation.it: …senso patriottico che ci faceva dire che noi ungheresi non facevamo queste cose.

translation.en: Hitler was in Germany, so what happened in Germany didn't reflect on us.
translation.it: Hitler era in Germania, quindi quanto accadeva là non ci toccava.

translation.en: I mean, we were far away from it.
translation.it: Insomma, eravamo lontani.

translation.en: [Randolph Braham] There were two wars.
translation.it: C'erano due guerre.

translation.en: There was a military war,
translation.it: C'era una guerra militare,

translation.en: and hand-in-hand with that war.
translation.it: e di pari passo con quella guerra,

translation.en: There was a second war,
translation.it: ce n'era un'altra,

translation.en: the war of the SS directed against the Jews.
translation.it: quella delle SS contro gli ebrei.

translation.en: The dark side of the Hungarian national character
translation.it: Il lato oscuro del carattere nazionale ungherese

translation.en: was becoming more and more obvious.
translation.it: stava diventando sempre più evidente.

translation.en: The persecution of Jews became more and more obvious.
translation.it: La persecuzione degli ebrei diventava sempre più evidente.

translation.en: Jews were losing their jobs, their businesses.
translation.it: Gli ebrei perdevano il lavoro, gli affari.

translation.en: There was a Hungarian Nazi movement, the Arrow Cross,
translation.it: C'era un movimento nazista ungherese, le Croci Frecciate,

translation.en: and this became, of course,
translation.it: che divenne, ovviamente,

translation.en: the most hated and the most feared group for Hungarian Jews.
translation.it: il gruppo più odiato e temuto dagli ebrei ungheresi.

translation.en: [Renee Firestone] People wonder, "How is it that we didn't do something?"
translation.it: La gente si chiede perché non facemmo niente.

translation.en: We didn't run away. We didn't hide.
translation.it: Non fuggimmo. Non ci nascondemmo.

translation.en: Well, things didn't happen at once.
translation.it: Le cose non accaddero di colpo.

translation.en: Things happened very slowly,
translation.it: Ma accadde tutto molto lentamente,

translation.en: so each time a new law came out, or a restriction,
translation.it: quindi, ogni volta che uscivano una nuova legge o un divieto,

translation.en: we said, "Well, just another thing. It'll blow over."
translation.it: dicevamo: "Beh, è solo una cosa in più. Passerà anche questa".

translation.en: [Tom Lantos] Hitler moved into Hungary on the 19th of March, 1944.
translation.it: Hitler invase l'Ungheria il 19 marzo del 1944.

translation.en: I was 16 years old.
translation.it: Avevo 16 anni.

translation.en: 1944, March 19th.
translation.it: Il 19 marzo del 1944.

translation.en: Germans entered, the SS entered, our town.
translation.it: I tedeschi, le SS, entrarono nel nostro paese.

translation.en: Two motorcycles was the whole Nazi regime that occupied our town
translation.it: Il regime nazista che occupò il paese consisteva di due motociclette,

translation.en: because they were there with the people that lived there the whole time and did their dirty.
translation.it: perché avevano già persone sul posto che facevano il lavoro sporco per loro.

translation.en: Most of them were people we thought were our friends all these years,
translation.it: La maggior parte erano persone che per anni avevamo reputato amiche,

translation.en: but they turned overnight on us
translation.it: e che di punto in bianco ci voltarono le spalle

translation.en: and went with the other side.
translation.it: passando dall'altra parte.

translation.en: And the next restriction was
translation.it: Il divieto successivo che imposero

translation.en: that the Jew cannot walk out on the street without the yellow star.
translation.it: fu che gli ebrei non potevano più uscire per strada senza la stella gialla.

translation.en: We heard that in Germany they to wear the yellow star
translation.it: Avevamo appreso che anche in Germania la portavano

translation.en: before they were taken away,
translation.it: prima di venire deportati,

translation.en: and in Poland, they did that.
translation.it: come anche in Polonia.

translation.en: So at that point we were worried.
translation.it: A quel punto iniziammo a preoccuparci.

translation.en: [Tom Lantos] I did not wear a yellow star
translation.it: Io non la portavo,

translation.en: and I was caught.
translation.it: ma mi scoprirono.

translation.en: I was put into a forced-labor camp
translation.it: Mi misero in un campo di lavori forzati

translation.en: in a place north of Budapest,
translation.it: in una località a nord di Budapest,

translation.en: which had an important railroad bridge.
translation.it: dove c'era un importante ponte ferroviario.

translation.en: And our job was to repair the railroads,
translation.it: Il nostro lavoro consisteva… TOM CON I NIPOTI ANSA DEL DANUBIO, UNGHERIA …nel riparare la ferrovia,

translation.en: the lines, the bridges, non-stop,
translation.it: le linee e i ponti, senza sosta,

translation.en: while the British and the Americans were bombing day and night.
translation.it: mentre gli inglesi e gli americani bombardavano giorno e notte.

translation.en: We were obviously worried that we would die.
translation.it: Ovviamente temevamo di morire.

translation.en: But we were also hoping
translation.it: Ma speravamo anche

translation.en: that the American and British bombers will hit all of their targets
translation.it: che i bombardieri americani e britannici colpissero tutti i loro obiettivi

translation.en: and destroy this bridge
translation.it: e distruggessero questo ponte,

translation.en: because that was the way to defeat Hitler.
translation.it: perché quello era il modo per sconfiggere Hitler.

translation.en: I escaped from that labor camp,
translation.it: Fuggii da quel campo di lavoro,

translation.en: and I joined the Hungarian underground.
translation.it: e mi unii alla resistenza ungherese.

translation.en: And the next decree would be that we have to pack up 25 kilos.
translation.it: Il decreto successivo ci imponeva di non superare i 25 chili con le valigie.

translation.en: And at first, we didn't understand. What do you take?
translation.it: All'inizio non capivamo. Cosa prendiamo?

translation.en: Think about your home, your own home.
translation.it: Pensa a casa, a casa tua.

translation.en: What would you take, 25 kilos?
translation.it: Cosa prendi, per 25 chili?

translation.en: What is 25 kilos?
translation.it: Cosa sono 25 chili?

translation.en: How much is 25 kilos?
translation.it: Quanti sono 25 chili?

translation.en: Do you take the pillows? Your covers?
translation.it: Prendi i cuscini? Le coperte?

translation.en: Do you take your dishes? Do you take…
translation.it: Prendi i piatti? Prendi…

translation.en: What do you take?
translation.it: Cosa prendi?

translation.en: When we were packing,
translation.it: Mentre facevamo i bagagli,

translation.en: I wanted to take something that would remind me of the good times.
translation.it: volevo prendere qualcosa che mi ricordasse i bei momenti.

translation.en: I was very depressed and worried.
translation.it: Ero molto depressa e preoccupata.

translation.en: And so I came across a bathing suit.
translation.it: E per le mani mi capitò un costume da bagno,

translation.en: A bathing suit that my father brought me.
translation.it: un costume che mi aveva portato mio padre.

translation.en: I don't want to do this.
translation.it: Non voglio farlo.

translation.en: On one of his business trips, about three years earlier,
translation.it: Circa tre anni prima, mio padre tornò

translation.en: my father came home.
translation.it: da un viaggio di lavoro.

translation.en: And, um… he always brought us something,
translation.it: E… ci portava sempre qualcosa,

translation.en: my sister and myself.
translation.it: a me e a mia sorella.

translation.en: And, uh…
translation.it: E…

translation.en: of course, we always asked, "What did you bring?"
translation.it: Naturalmente, gli chiedevamo sempre: "Cosa ci hai portato?"

translation.en: And he opened this box,
translation.it: Aprì una scatola

translation.en: and out of the box came this most beautiful bathing suit.
translation.it: e dalla scatola uscì un bellissimo costume da bagno.

translation.en: It had a shiny satin finish
translation.it: Era lucente e satinato

translation.en: and a print of multicolored flowers.
translation.it: con una fantasia a fiori colorati. RENÉE (A DESTRA) NEL 1943 19 ANNI

translation.en: And then in the afternoon, when I heard the soldiers' boots coming up the stairs,
translation.it: Nel pomeriggio, quando udii gli stivali dei soldati salire le scale,

translation.en: I ran back, and I put this bathing suit under my dress.
translation.it: corsi ad infilarmi il costume sotto il vestito.

translation.en: And that's how I left.
translation.it: E fu così che partii.

translation.en: They broke down the front doors. They came in. They gave us a few minutes.
translation.it: Sfondarono le porte di casa ed entrarono. Ci dettero qualche minuto…

translation.en: They said a half hour, but it was not a half hour,
translation.it: Dissero mezz'ora, ma non era mezz'ora.

translation.en: to get it all our valuables together,
translation.it: ...per raccogliere tutti i nostri effetti

translation.en: and they… They marched us out of the house.
translation.it: e, marciando, ci fecero uscire di casa.

translation.en: I couldn't imagine that they just take out people from their homes…
translation.it: Non potevo immaginare che cacciassero le persone di casa…

translation.en: because they're Jewish.
translation.it: perché erano ebrei.

translation.en: Our friends, so-called, and neighbors,
translation.it: I nostri cosiddetti amici e vicini

translation.en: they were standing lined up alongside of the road,
translation.it: erano in fila lungo la strada,

translation.en: and they were yelling,
translation.it: e urlavano:

translation.en: "It's about time, you go on out of here. And we don't need any Jews in our town."
translation.it: "Era ora, andatevene via da qui. Non vogliamo ebrei qui.

translation.en: "We need to get rid of all you Jews."
translation.it: Dobbiamo sbarazzarci di voi."

translation.en: I stood, and I could not believe my eyes.
translation.it: Rimasi di sasso, non credevo ai miei occhi.

translation.en: [hesitates] The people I went to school with their children. We were friends.
translation.it: Andavo a scuola coi figli di quelle persone, eravamo amici.

translation.en: We were sharing things together.
translation.it: Condividevamo le cose.

translation.en: Why are they so hostile? Why do they hate us all of a sudden?
translation.it: Perché sono così ostili? Perché all'improvviso ci odiano?

translation.en: It's like when you read that the Jews went out of Egypt.
translation.it: Era come quando gli ebrei fuggirono dall'Egitto.

translation.en: We are carrying all our baggage.
translation.it: Ognuno aveva il suo bagaglio.

translation.en: The pillows and the covers are tied to them, bundled.
translation.it: I cuscini e le coperte erano legati ad essi, aggrovigliati.

translation.en: And we children helped to carry. And I'm so ashamed.
translation.it: E noi bambini aiutavamo a trasportarli. Mi vergognavo tanto.

translation.en: [Renee Firestone] We wanted to believe they're gonna take us to Germany.
translation.it: Volevamo credere che ci avrebbero portato in Germania a lavorare.

translation.en: And we're gonna work. We really wanted to believe it.
translation.it: Volevamo credere che ci avrebbero portato in Germania a lavorare. Volevamo davvero crederlo.

translation.en: And by then, the whole European Jewry was already in camps,
translation.it: Ormai tutti gli ebrei d'Europa erano già nei campi di concentramento,

translation.en: which we didn't know.
translation.it: ma noi non lo sapevamo.

translation.en: The concentration, ghettoization and deportation
translation.it: Il concentramento, la ghettizzazione e la deportazione

translation.en: took place in a concentrated manner that is within 12 weeks.
translation.it: avvennero in modo concentrato, ossia nel giro di 12 settimane.

translation.en: And nowhere else was the deportation program carried out
translation.it: Da nessun'altra parte, il programma di deportazione fu eseguito

translation.en: with the barbarity and speed that it was in Hungary.
translation.it: con la stessa barbarie e la stessa velocità usate in Ungheria.

translation.en: They say that they will take us to a ghetto,
translation.it: Ci dissero che ci portavano in un ghetto,

translation.en: and we'd never heard that word.
translation.it: ma era una parola che non conoscevamo.

translation.en: It is not a Hungarian word, "ghetto."
translation.it: Non è una parola ungherese, "ghetto".

translation.en: [Renee Firestone] We had no idea where we were.
translation.it: Non avevamo idea di dove fossimo.

translation.en: In the morning, when we woke up,
translation.it: La mattina, quando ci svegliammo,

translation.en: I realized that we are in a brickyard.
translation.it: mi resi conto che eravamo in un deposito di mattoni.

translation.en: Brick factory yard.
translation.it: Nel cortile di una fabbrica.

translation.en: And in April, it was rainy. It was a lot of rain.
translation.it: Era aprile, e pioveva. Pioveva molto.

translation.en: And we were always…
translation.it: Ed eravamo sempre…

translation.en: We had to change the sheet because the roof was the sheet,
translation.it: Dovevamo cambiare il lenzuolo. Il tetto era il lenzuolo.

translation.en: and we were always wet.
translation.it: Ed eravamo sempre bagnati.

translation.en: There were thousands of people there because they came from the whole county.
translation.it: C'erano migliaia di persone, perché venivano da tutta la provincia.

translation.en: And there were guards everywhere, with dogs,
translation.it: E c'erano guardie dappertutto, con cani,

translation.en: walking around all the time, big German Shepherd dogs,
translation.it: che giravano di continuo, grossi pastori tedeschi,

translation.en: on very, very tight leashes.
translation.it: tenuti ben stretti al guinzaglio.

translation.en: …because this was all these huts, with people, people all over the place.
translation.it: …perché qui era pieno di baracche e c'era gente dappertutto.

translation.en: [Robin] Do you know where your hut was?
translation.it: - Sai dove si trovava la tua? - Sì.

translation.en: [Irene Zisblatt] Yes. My hut was right here, where these piles of bricks are.
translation.it: - Sai dove si trovava la tua? - Sì. La mia baracca era proprio qui, dove ci sono queste pile di mattoni.

translation.en: [sniffles] And then one day they announced
translation.it: Poi un giorno annunciarono

translation.en: that everybody that wants to go to work to Tokay
translation.it: che chi voleva andare a lavorare a Tokaj

translation.en: on the vineyard to make wine should come here,
translation.it: nei vigneti per fare vino, doveva venire…

translation.en: and everybody voluntary, gladly went on the train
translation.it: E tutti spontaneamente e felicemente salirono sul treno,

translation.en: because this was hell.
translation.it: perché era un inferno.

translation.en: And going to work in a vineyard was like going to heaven from this.
translation.it: E lavorare in un vigneto sembrava il paradiso.

translation.en: We were taken to the railroad station by the Hungarian soldiers.
translation.it: Venimmo condotti alla stazione dai soldati ungheresi.

translation.en: My mother said to me,
translation.it: Mia madre mi disse:

translation.en: "I rolled up diamonds in your skirt, in the hem of your skirt."
translation.it: "Ti ho nascosto dei diamanti nella gonna, nell'orlo della gonna.

translation.en: "And if you don't have enough to eat, those are to buy bread."
translation.it: Se non hai abbastanza da mangiare, usali per comprare il pane."

translation.en: When we arrived at the railroad station,
translation.it: Quando arrivammo alla stazione,

translation.en: we realized that we're not going on passenger trains.
translation.it: ci rendemmo conto che non c'erano treni passeggeri.

translation.en: The cattle cars were waiting for us.
translation.it: Ci aspettavano carri bestiame.

translation.en: [Irene Zisblatt] My father said, "They ran out of other trains because it's wartime."
translation.it: Mio padre disse: "Mancano i treni passeggeri perché c'è la guerra.

translation.en: "They don't have the other train. So, they have to use what they have."
translation.it: Non ne hanno altri. Devono usare ciò che hanno."

translation.en: [Alice Lok Cahana] Anybody who didn't go and didn't go fast was beaten.
translation.it: Chi non camminava o non camminava veloce abbastanza veniva percosso.

translation.en: When they closed the doors, then I heard that knock on the outside
translation.it: Quando chiusero i portelloni, sentii un rumore dall'esterno

translation.en: like a bolt closing us in there.
translation.it: come di un catenaccio che ci chiudeva dentro.

translation.en: It wasn't normal anymore. It wasn't…
translation.it: Non era più una cosa normale.

translation.en: I didn't accept that they were running out of the other trains.
translation.it: Non accettai che non avessero altri treni disponibili.

translation.en: [Bill Basch] In Budapest, this time started getting worse.
translation.it: A Budapest, le cose cominciarono a peggiorare.

translation.en: I really had to acquire Gentile papers.
translation.it: Dovetti procurarmi dei documenti ariani.

translation.en: I did not exist as a Jew.
translation.it: Come ebreo non esistevo.

translation.en: I would have been shot. I would have been killed.
translation.it: Mi avrebbero sparato. Sarei stato ucciso.

translation.en: You were a hunted animal, 24 hours, every day,
translation.it: Eri una preda, 24 ore al giorno, tutti i giorni,

translation.en: and you didn't know if anybody you encountered
translation.it: E non sapevi se chi incontravi

translation.en: was really on your side.
translation.it: fosse davvero dalla tua parte.

translation.en: Had it not been for Wallenberg,
translation.it: Non fosse stato per Wallenberg,

translation.en: neither I nor the other tens of thousands would have ever survived.
translation.it: né io né altre decine di migliaia di persone saremmo sopravvissuti.

translation.en: Raoul Wallenberg arrived when all of Hungary,
translation.it: Raoul Wallenberg arrivò quando tutta l'Ungheria,

translation.en: with the exception of Budapest, was already free of Jews.
translation.it: ad eccezione di Budapest, era già libera da ebrei.

translation.en: He went to Budapest at a time when, in the countryside,
translation.it: Arrivò a Budapest in un momento in cui, nella provincia,

translation.en: the Jews had already been put into cattle cars
translation.it: gli ebrei erano già stati caricati sui carri bestiame

translation.en: and shipped away from Hungary.
translation.it: e portati via dall'Ungheria.

translation.en: And he decided to join the Swedish embassy there
translation.it: E decise di unirsi all'ambasciata svedese

translation.en: for the sole purpose of trying to save Jewish lives.
translation.it: con l'unico scopo di salvare gli ebrei.

translation.en: By issuing so-called Swedish protective passports,
translation.it: Rilasciando i cosiddetti passaporti svedesi di protezione,

translation.en: he declared that the individual who had this document
translation.it: dichiarò che i titolari di quel documento

translation.en: at the end of the war planned to go to Sweden.
translation.it: alla fine della guerra sarebbero andati in Svezia.

translation.en: This was pure fiction, but in the chaos and the confusion of the war,
translation.it: Era pura finzione, ma nel caos e nella confusione della guerra,

translation.en: this miraculous, worthless piece of paper worked.
translation.it: questo pezzo di carta senza valore funzionò.

translation.en: [Bill Basch] Several of us acted as distributors or runners
translation.it: Molti di noi funsero da messi o da fattorini

translation.en: to deliver this fake passport
translation.it: per consegnare questi passaporti falsi

translation.en: to the people that were waiting in those protected houses.
translation.it: alle persone che aspettavano in case protette.

translation.en: [Tom Lantos] Wallenberg leased large apartment houses,
translation.it: Wallenberg affittò grandi condomini,

translation.en: put up a Swedish sign indicating that all the residents
translation.it: vi appese un'insegna in svedese che indicava che tutti i residenti

translation.en: were under the protection of the royal Swedish government.
translation.it: erano protetti dal governo reale svedese.

translation.en: I stayed at St. Stephen Park, number 25.
translation.it: Io stavo al 25 di St. Stephen Park.

translation.en: Most of these houses were upper-middle-class apartment houses,
translation.it: La maggior parte di queste case erano condomini della borghesia medio-alta,

translation.en: and a three-bedroom apartment,
translation.it: e un appartamento con tre camere da letto,

translation.en: that may have had four, five, six people living there before this crisis,
translation.it: che poteva ospitare quattro, cinque, sei persone prima di questa crisi,

translation.en: suddenly became a hovel
translation.it: all'improvviso diventò un tugurio

translation.en: with 60, 70 people jammed into a three-bedroom apartment.
translation.it: con 60, 70 persone stipate in un appartamento tricamere.

translation.en: [girl 1] Very uncomfortable.
translation.it: Molto scomodo.

translation.en: It was very uncomfortable, honey,
translation.it: Era molto scomodo, tesoro,

translation.en: but more importantly, it was unbelievably dangerous.
translation.it: ma soprattutto era incredibilmente pericoloso.

translation.en: The word "protected house" obviously is a misnomer,
translation.it: La definizione "casa protettiva" è ovviamente impropria,

translation.en: uh, because many of the people living in these quote-unquote "protected houses"
translation.it: perché molte delle persone che ci vivevano

translation.en: were rounded up, taken to the bank of the Danube, and killed.
translation.it: furono rastrellate, portate sulla riva del Danubio e assassinate.

translation.en: Now, to get into the protected houses was not difficult.
translation.it: Entrare nelle case protette… non era difficile.

translation.en: Soldiers didn't care.
translation.it: Ai soldati non importava.

translation.en: They were out in the front. "Go in there."
translation.it: Erano fuori che dicevano: "Entrate pure".

translation.en: However, to come out
translation.it: Tuttavia, uscirne…

translation.en: that was the very, very difficult thing.
translation.it: era una cosa molto difficile.

translation.en: If German soldiers or Hungarian Nazi soldiers were suspicious,
translation.it: Se i soldati tedeschi o i nazisti ungheresi si insospettivano,

translation.en: they ordered us to take down our pants
translation.it: ci ordinavano di abbassarci i pantaloni,

translation.en: because we were the only people who were circumcised.
translation.it: perché eravamo gli unici ad essere circoncisi.

translation.en: One day, I had on my body, strapped around, the fake passports,
translation.it: Un giorno mi ero legato attorno al corpo i passaporti falsi.

translation.en: which I was delivering to these people so they could get out of the building,
translation.it: Dovevo consegnarli a delle persone affinché potessero lasciare le loro case,

translation.en: and I miscalculated.
translation.it: ma feci male i calcoli.

translation.en: I went through the sewer line, and I knew when to get out.
translation.it: Attraversai le fogne e sapevo dove uscire.

translation.en: And I made a mistake,
translation.it: Ma commisi un errore.

translation.en: instead of coming out in the middle of the building,
translation.it: Invece di uscire in mezzo all'edificio,

translation.en: I came out in front of the building,
translation.it: uscii davanti all'edificio,

translation.en: where two soldiers were guarding the building.
translation.it: dove c'erano due soldati di guardia.

translation.en: I started running as fast as I could,
translation.it: Mi misi a correre più forte che potevo,

translation.en: crossing the street back and forth.
translation.it: attraversando la strada avanti e indietro.

translation.en: And they were deporting a group of Jews,
translation.it: Stavano deportando un gruppo di ebrei.

translation.en: not knowing where they're taking them,
translation.it: Senza sapere dove li stessero portando,

translation.en: I jumped into that group of Jews thinking,
translation.it: mi infilai in quel gruppo di ebrei, pensando:

translation.en: "As I got in so many times into trouble, I'll get out one more time."
translation.it: "Sono finito molte volte nei guai, ne uscirò anche questa volta.

translation.en: "Just one more escape."
translation.it: È una fuga come un'altra."

translation.en: We would up five days later in Buchenwald.
translation.it: Cinque giorni dopo, ci ritrovammo a Buchenwald.

translation.en: [Irene Zisblatt] We were on the train for about five days.
translation.it: Restammo sul treno per circa cinque giorni.

translation.en: Sitting on a heap of luggage that we carried there.
translation.it: Seduti su un mucchio di valigie che ci eravamo portati dietro.

translation.en: The cattle car that I was in, there was about 120 of us.
translation.it: Nel mio carro bestiame eravamo circa in 120.

translation.en: Mashed together like sardines, and it's very, very hot.
translation.it: Schiacciati come sardine, e faceva caldissimo.

translation.en: They had one pail, you know, for going to the bathroom.
translation.it: Avevano messo un secchio per i nostri bisogni.

translation.en: And suddenly the buckets filled up, and then the odor was unbearable.
translation.it: E all'improvviso il secchio si riempì e l'odore era insopportabile.

translation.en: They never opened the doors to go to the bathroom.
translation.it: Non aprirono mai i portelloni per farci andare al bagno.

translation.en: They never gave us any water. They never gave us any food.
translation.it: Non ci dettero mai acqua. E neanche da mangiare.

translation.en: The children were screaming. They wanted to go home.
translation.it: I bambini gridavano che volevano tornare a casa.

translation.en: "Where are they taking us? Where are they taking us?"
translation.it: "Dove ci portano?"

translation.en: Nobody answered.
translation.it: Non rispondeva nessuno.

translation.en: It was total darkness.
translation.it: C'era buio totale.

translation.en: The light seeped only through the cracks of the cattle car.
translation.it: La luce filtrava solo attraverso le fessure del vagone.

translation.en: [Irene Zisblatt] My father found a crack in the cattle train.
translation.it: Mio padre trovò una fessura nel vagone.

translation.en: He looked out, and he spoke out loud,
translation.it: Guardò fuori e disse ad alta voce:

translation.en: "I don't think we're going to the vineyard
translation.it: "Non credo che stiamo andando al vigneto,

translation.en: because we just crossed the border, and we're heading towards Poland."
translation.it: perché abbiamo appena sconfinato e ci stiamo dirigendo verso la Polonia."

translation.en: When he said Poland,
translation.it: Quando ha detto "Polonia",

translation.en: I remembered the man telling the story about the children,
translation.it: mi sono ricordata di quanto aveva detto quell'uomo sui bambini

translation.en: what they're doing to the children in Poland.
translation.it: e di cosa facevano loro in Polonia.

translation.en: And I was holding my little brother. He was two-and-a-half years old.
translation.it: Tenevo in braccio il mio fratellino. Aveva due anni e mezzo,

translation.en: I was holding him so tight.
translation.it: E lo tenevo stretto.

translation.en: And I said to him, I said to myself,
translation.it: E gli dissi… e dissi a me stessa:

translation.en: "I will never let him go. They will never take him from me."
translation.it: "Non lo lascerò mai. Non lo porteranno mai via."

translation.en: When they opened the door suddenly…
translation.it: Quando aprirono il portellone…

translation.en: and suddenly the light hit you.
translation.it: all'improvviso la luce ci colpì.

translation.en: And because you had your eyes for four, five days shut,
translation.it: E poiché avevi tenuto gli occhi chiusi per quattro, cinque giorni,

translation.en: or used to this darkness,
translation.it: essendosi abituati al buio,

translation.en: you're almost blinded.
translation.it: per poco non ci accecò.

translation.en: We were so happy because we were going to get air.
translation.it: Eravamo felicissimi, perché avremmo preso aria.

translation.en: We were gonna get off, go to the bathroom like normal people,
translation.it: Saremmo scesi e andati in bagno come le persone normali,

translation.en: and have water and maybe some food.
translation.it: e bevuto acqua e magari mangiato qualcosa.

translation.en: And everybody would ask, "Where are we? What's the name?"
translation.it: Tutti chiedevano: "Dove siamo? Come si chiama questo posto?"

translation.en: And it was very strange name.
translation.it: E aveva un nome molto strano.

translation.en: [Alice Lok Cahana] Here, we had to be stopped.
translation.it: Qui dovevamo fermarci. Ci fermammo qui.

translation.en: Here was… A lot of selection happened.
translation.it: Qui… venivano fatte le selezioni.

translation.en: -You're all standing in a line-- -Thousands of people,
translation.it: - Siete tutti in fila… - Migliaia di persone,

translation.en: close to each other,
translation.it: una accanto all'altra,

translation.en: and confusion and noise.
translation.it: c'era confusione e rumore.

translation.en: And then… Don't move, and don't… [snaps fingers]
translation.it: E poi… "Non muovetevi, non…"

translation.en: Like soldiers standing straight, you see?
translation.it: Come soldati allineati, capisci?

translation.en: And in the middle would the SS go here,
translation.it: E in mezzo passavano le SS,

translation.en: to check all of us.
translation.it: per controllarci tutti.

translation.en: Walking the dogs and just threatening.
translation.it: Passavano con i cani, minacciosi.

translation.en: -Single file, or people standing next to… -Five.
translation.it: - La fila era unica o accanto avevi… - Cinque.

translation.en: [Michael] Five in a row.
translation.it: Cinque per fila.

translation.en: [Alice Lok Cahana] So it was easy to count, right.
translation.it: Così era più facile contarci. Esatto.

translation.en: [Renee Firestone] When I jumped off the cattle car,
translation.it: Quando scesi dal carro bestiame,

translation.en: I knew right away that whatever they promised us,
translation.it: capii subito che ciò che ci avevano promesso,

translation.en: whatever they told us, were lies.
translation.it: quanto ci avevano detto, erano bugie.

translation.en: And you see a lot of people running in striped clothes and shaved heads.
translation.it: E si vedeva un sacco di gente che correva in abiti a strisce e con la testa rasata.

translation.en: Surrounded by Nazi soldiers and vicious dogs.
translation.it: Circondati da soldati nazisti e cani feroci.

translation.en: And they were yelling, and they were screaming.
translation.it: E urlavano e gridavano.

translation.en: "Hurry up! Leave all your luggage there. Just leave everything."
translation.it: "Muovetevi! Lasciate qui i bagagli. Lasciate tutto qui."

translation.en: All of a sudden, there was a separation,
translation.it: All'improvviso, ci separarono,

translation.en: and my mother and my…
translation.it: e mia madre e mio…

translation.en: my mother and… [exhales]
translation.it: Mia madre e…

translation.en: and my brother and my sister…
translation.it: mio fratello e mia sorella…

translation.en: She held my little brother in her arms, in one arm,
translation.it: Teneva in braccio il mio fratellino, con un braccio,

translation.en: and my four-and-a-half-year-old sister in her hand. I was holding onto her hand.
translation.it: e per mano la mia sorellina di quattro anni e mezzo. E io la tenevo per mano.

translation.en: This is how we were walking towards…
translation.it: Ed è così che procedevamo verso…

translation.en: They were pushing us towards that destination.
translation.it: Ci spingevano verso quella destinazione.

translation.en: [in German] When the transports came in,
translation.it: Quando arrivarono i convogli,

translation.en: the people were sorted.
translation.it: la gente veniva smistata.

translation.en: It was a very basic process, a very simple one.
translation.it: Era un processo molto basico, molto semplice.

translation.en: The people had to stand in a long line.
translation.it: La gente doveva disporsi in una lunga fila.

translation.en: At the front of the line were some medical officers who would say,
translation.it: La gente doveva disporsi in una lunga fila. All'inizio della fila c'erano degli ufficiali medici

translation.en: "This one’s too old, over 50."
translation.it: All'inizio della fila c'erano degli ufficiali medici che dicevano: "Questo è troppo vecchio, ha più di 50 anni".

translation.en: "This one goes to the right. The other goes left."
translation.it: che dicevano: "Questo è troppo vecchio, ha più di 50 anni". "Questo va a destra, quello a sinistra."

translation.en: [Renee Firestone] My mother was selected at the railroad station,
translation.it: Mia madre alla stazione venne selezionata

translation.en: going to the left while my sister and I went to the right.
translation.it: per andare a sinistra, mentre io e mia sorella a destra.

translation.en: My mother was taken
translation.it: Mia madre venne portata

translation.en: straight from the railroad station to the gas chambers.
translation.it: dalla stazione direttamente nelle camere a gas.

translation.en: By the time my sister and I were processed into the camp,
translation.it: Quando io e mia sorella completammo le procedure,

translation.en: my mother was no longer alive.
translation.it: mia madre era già morta.

translation.en: [Renee Firestone] We were taken to a dressing room.
translation.it: Ci portarono in uno spogliatoio.

translation.en: We were told we're gonna be taking a shower after this…
translation.it: Ci dissero che poi avremmo potuto fare una doccia…

translation.en: after this horrendous journey,
translation.it: dopo quell'orrendo viaggio,

translation.en: and we are going to refresh ourselves,
translation.it: e che ci saremmo rinfrescati,

translation.en: and then we will be assigned to our work.
translation.it: e che poi ci avrebbero assegnato il nostro lavoro.

translation.en: [Irene Zisblatt] They ordered us to take our shoes in one hand and our clothes in the other.
translation.it: Ci ordinarono di tenere le scarpe in una mano e i vestiti nell'altra.

translation.en: And I remembered the diamonds.
translation.it: E mi ricordai dei diamanti.

translation.en: And I grabbed my blue skirt, and in the crowd, you know,
translation.it: Così afferrai la mia gonna blu e tra la folla

translation.en: I just fast took out the diamonds and held them in my hands,
translation.it: li tirai fuori rapidamente stringendoli in mano,

translation.en: and I had no clothes on my body.
translation.it: e non avevo vestiti addosso.

translation.en: And I remember I got undressed with the rest of them,
translation.it: Ricordo che mi spogliai insieme alle altre,

translation.en: and there I was in the bathing suit, standing in the bathing suit.
translation.it: ed ero lì in costume da bagno, in piedi, in costume.

translation.en: I had a premonition.
translation.it: Ebbi un presentimento.

translation.en: I had this feeling that if I take this bathing suit off,
translation.it: Ebbi la sensazione che se mi fossi tolta il costume,

translation.en: if I leave this bathing suit behind,
translation.it: se mi fossi separata da quel costume,

translation.en: all the wonderful memories that were built in this bathing suit…
translation.it: tutti i meravigliosi ricordi che esso rappresentava…

translation.en: I kept remembering how I walked around the swimming pool,
translation.it: Mi ricordavo come camminavo con quel costume a bordo piscina,

translation.en: and how the boys were whistling at me, and my friends were so jealous.
translation.it: e i ragazzi che mi fischiavano dietro e le mie amiche erano così gelose.

translation.en: And now I'm going to take it off, and I'm going to leave it here.
translation.it: E ora dovevo toglierlo e lasciarlo qui?

translation.en: Everything that meant anything in life to me, I'm going to leave behind.
translation.it: Tutto ciò che significava qualcosa per me, dovevo separarmene?

translation.en: [Irene] They kept on saying
translation.it: Di continuo ci dicevano

translation.en: if anybody has any valuables left, to leave them.
translation.it: che chiunque avesse avuto oggetti di valore, avrebbe dovuto lasciarli.

translation.en: They had a section for that. [sniffles]
translation.it: Che avevano una sezione apposita.

translation.en: I held onto the diamonds for dear life because that was to buy bread.
translation.it: Io tenevo i diamanti ben stretti, perché mi servivano per comprare il pane.

translation.en: So I put them in my mouth.
translation.it: Così me li misi in bocca.

translation.en: And then when I walked up again,
translation.it: E quando mi avvicinai,

translation.en: I saw they were opening people's mouths, and they were looking in,
translation.it: vidi che aprivano la bocca alle persone per guardarci dentro,

translation.en: but I was in the… I was, like, at the at the road of no return.
translation.it: ma ero… ormai non potevo tornare indietro.

translation.en: I couldn't give 'em up any more because I would be shot.
translation.it: Non potevo più consegnarli. Mi avrebbero sparato.

translation.en: Why didn't I leave 'em back there?
translation.it: Perché non li avevo lasciati lì?

translation.en: And I had them in my mouth,
translation.it: Ce li avevo in bocca

translation.en: and I didn't know what to do, so I swallowed them.
translation.it: e non sapevo cosa fare, così li ingoiai.

translation.en: We walked into the shower room,
translation.it: Entrammo nella stanza della doccia

translation.en: and the dressing room was locked behind us,
translation.it: e ci chiusero la porta degli spogliatoi,

translation.en: and a commando came in and removed all our belongings right away.
translation.it: entrò una squadra e requisì tutti i nostri averi.

translation.en: They did give us a shower, a little, trinkly shower, and then they…
translation.it: Ci fecero fare una doccia, una misera doccia gocciolante

translation.en: Again, there was a door on the other side
translation.it: C'era una porta sul lato opposto

translation.en: leading out to the courtyard on the other side of this building.
translation.it: che conduceva in cortile dall'altra parte dell'edificio.

translation.en: And at the door, they had a pile of clothes.
translation.it: E alla porta, c'era una pila di vestiti,

translation.en: And they ordered everybody to pick one piece of clothing.
translation.it: e ci ordinarono di prendere un capo ciascuno.

translation.en: We waited till about midnight,
translation.it: Aspettammo fino a mezzanotte circa,

translation.en: then they permitted us to walk into one of these wooden barracks.
translation.it: quando ci permisero di entrare in un dormitorio di legno.

translation.en: [Alice Lok Cahana] A thousand people in a barrack.
translation.it: Mille persone per dormitorio.

translation.en: If one person turned, everybody had to turn
translation.it: Se una persona si girava, dovevamo girarci tutti,

translation.en: because we were so close to each other.
translation.it: da quanto eravamo stipati.

translation.en: I used to wake up so cold,
translation.it: Mi svegliavo così infreddolita

translation.en: and I…
translation.it: e…

translation.en: used to have returning dreams
translation.it: facevo dei sogni ricorrenti

translation.en: that I'm at home,
translation.it: che ero a casa,

translation.en: that I'm very cold,
translation.it: che avevo molto freddo,

translation.en: but my father will come and comfort me, so…
translation.it: ma mio padre veniva a coprirmi e…

translation.en: And then, you wake up.
translation.it: Poi venivi svegliato.

translation.en: From a whistle.
translation.it: Da un fischio.

translation.en: It's dark outside.
translation.it: Fuori era buio.

translation.en: And this is a madman's hell.
translation.it: Ed era un inferno di pazzi.

translation.en: [Renee Firestone] We saw this group of about 20 men coming through the camp,
translation.it: C'era un gruppo di una ventina di uomini che si avvicinavano attraversando il campo

translation.en: and as they were marching by, I was watching.
translation.it: e mentre marciavano, li osservai.

translation.en: Maybe I know somebody.
translation.it: Forse riconoscevo qualcuno.

translation.en: And suddenly, I recognize my father.
translation.it: E all'improvviso, riconobbi mio padre.

translation.en: And my first thought was to hide.
translation.it: Il mio primo pensiero fu di nascondermi.

translation.en: It was terribly painful seeing him
translation.it: Fu terribilmente doloroso vederlo

translation.en: with his shaved head and his uniform, like a prisoner.
translation.it: con la testa rasata e l'uniforme, come un prigioniero.

translation.en: This man who was helping everybody,
translation.it: Quest'uomo che aiutava tutti,

translation.en: who was the kindest human being.
translation.it: il più gentile degli uomini.

translation.en: I just couldn't imagine how would he feel if he saw us
translation.it: Non riuscivo a immaginare come si sarebbe sentito se ci avesse visto

translation.en: with the shaved heads and in this rag.
translation.it: con le teste rasate e quegli stracci?

translation.en: So I really just wanted to hide so he can't see me.
translation.it: Quindi mi nascosi in modo che non mi potesse vedere.

translation.en: And at that moment, our eyes locked.
translation.it: E in quell'istante, i nostri occhi si incrociarono.

translation.en: And I could see his tears rolling down his cheek.
translation.it: Vidi le lacrime che gli rigavano le guance.

translation.en: That was the last time I saw my father.
translation.it: Fu l'ultima volta che vidi mio padre.

translation.en: [Irene Zisblatt] I saw trucks coming
translation.it: Vidi arrivare dei camion

translation.en: and screams in the trucks.
translation.it: da cui provenivano delle urla,

translation.en: And I saw two children fall out of the truck.
translation.it: e vidi due bambini cadere da un camion.

translation.en: [Irene] And the truck stopped,
translation.it: Il camion si fermò.

translation.en: [Irene Zisblatt] And the trucks [hesitates]…
translation.it: E i camion…

translation.en: And one SS man came out from the front,
translation.it: Un uomo delle SS scese dal davanti,

translation.en: and he picked up the children… [sniffs] …like that.
translation.it: e afferrò i bambini, in questo modo.

translation.en: And he banged him against the truck,
translation.it: E lo sbattè contro il camion,

translation.en: and the blood came running down, and threw him into the truck, so…
translation.it: e iniziò a grondare di sangue, e poi lo ributtò sul camion.

translation.en: That's when I stopped talking to God.
translation.it: Fu allora che smisi di parlare con Dio.

translation.en: They told us that we're gonna get a number.
translation.it: Ci dissero che avremmo avuto un numero.

translation.en: Prisoner's number.
translation.it: Un numero di prigionia.

translation.en: Well, of course, we expected to get a prisoner's number
translation.it: Pensavamo ovviamente di vedercelo appuntare

translation.en: on our clothing or somewhere.
translation.it: sugli abiti da qualche parte.

translation.en: And they set up these tables.
translation.it: Ma prepararono dei tavoli.

translation.en: And at each table sat a few guards
translation.it: E a ogni tavolo c'erano delle guardie

translation.en: with huge books open in front of them.
translation.it: con degli enormi libri aperti davanti a loro.

translation.en: And we presumed that they are going to put our name in it,
translation.it: E immaginammo che ci avrebbero scritto il nostro nome

translation.en: and the number that they're going to give us.
translation.it: e il numero che ci avrebbero dato.

translation.en: And then we realized that they are putting this number
translation.it: E poi capimmo che questo numero

translation.en: on our flesh,
translation.it: ce l'avrebbero messo nella carne.

translation.en: on our arms.
translation.it: Sulle braccia.

translation.en: They took five of us and put drops in our eyes.
translation.it: Presero cinque di noi e ci misero delle gocce negli occhi.

translation.en: We didn't know why. They didn't tell us. And they put us in the dungeon.
translation.it: Non sapevamo perché. Non ce lo dissero. E ci misero in una cella sotterranea.

translation.en: They closed us in there,
translation.it: Ci rinchiusero lì dentro,

translation.en: and we were standing in water up to our ankles, tightly packed,
translation.it: in piedi, con l'acqua alle caviglie, accalcati,

translation.en: and it seemed like forever.
translation.it: e sembrò un'eternità.

translation.en: It seemed like it was an eternity. They never opened the door.
translation.it: Sembrò un'eternità. Non ci aprivano mai.

translation.en: They never gave us anything to eat or drink.
translation.it: Non ci dettero niente da mangiare o da bere.

translation.en: So, we drank the water we stood in.
translation.it: Così bevemmo l'acqua in cui stavamo.

translation.en: We went to the bathroom in the water we stood in.
translation.it: Facemmo i bisogni nell'acqua in cui stavamo.

translation.en: And then they opened the door, and they took us out.
translation.it: Poi ci aprirono e ci condussero fuori.

translation.en: And they brought us up into the courtyard,
translation.it: E ci portarono nel cortile

translation.en: and they examined our eyes.
translation.it: e ci esaminarono gli occhi.

translation.en: And some of the people couldn't see for several days after that.
translation.it: E alcune persone per giorni non riuscivano a vedere.

translation.en: And they took us back to the barrack.
translation.it: Poi ci riportarono al dormitorio,

translation.en: And then we found out later what they were doing.
translation.it: e più tardi scoprimmo cosa stavano facendo.

translation.en: They were trying to change the color of our eyes.
translation.it: Cercavano di cambiarci il colore degli occhi.

translation.en: [in German] For those who wanted to conduct experiments on humans,
translation.it: Per chi avesse voluto condurre esperimenti sull'uomo,

translation.en: this was a useful workplace.
translation.it: era il posto di lavoro ideale.

translation.en: Many experiments were done in Auschwitz to find ways to sterilize women,
translation.it: Ad Auschwitz si fecero molti esperimenti soprattutto esperimenti diretti

translation.en: specifically Jewish women, in order to diminish the race
translation.it: a trovare il modo di sterilizzare le donne

translation.en: without going through too much trouble.
translation.it: in particolare le donne ebree, allo scopo di diminuire la razza

translation.en: These women were then sent back to the camp.
translation.it: senza troppa fatica. Poi venivano rinviate al campo.

translation.en: Sometimes they were immediately transferred
translation.it: A volte venivano subito trasferite,

translation.en: because they were so-called "secret bearers."
translation.it: A volte venivano subito trasferite, perché erano diventate le cosiddette "portatrici di segreti".

translation.en: They performed tests, then sent them back to Birkenau and gassed them.
translation.it: perché erano diventate le cosiddette "portatrici di segreti". Dopo i test, le spedivano a Birkenau e le uccidevano col gas.

translation.en: One day, a prisoner acquaintance came to me and asked me
translation.it: Un giorno, un prigioniero mio conoscente venne da me e mi chiese

translation.en: if I could try to gain some influence…
translation.it: se potessi usare la mia autorità…

translation.en: if anything could be done, not to send them to the gas chamber.
translation.it: se si potesse fare qualcosa, per salvarle dalla camera a gas.

translation.en: The only way to do that was to make them undergo more tests.
translation.it: L'unico modo per poterlo fare era di utilizzarle per altri test.

translation.en: To save them, we had to keep conducting harmless tests on them.
translation.it: Per salvarle, dovevamo continuare a fare dei test innocui.

translation.en: This is what we planned to do, and somehow it worked.
translation.it: Così decidemmo di fare questo e in qualche modo funzionò.

translation.en: And that is why I was acquitted…
translation.it: Così decidemmo di fare questo e in qualche modo funzionò. Ed è per questo che sono stato assolto…

translation.en: in Auschwitz.
translation.it: ad Auschwitz.

translation.en: [Randolph] Having survived the first four and a half years of the war,
translation.it: Dopo essere sopravvissuti ai primi quattro anni e mezzo di guerra,

translation.en: the Hungarian Jews were killed in the last chapter
translation.it: gli ebrei ungheresi furono uccisi nell'ultimo capitolo

translation.en: of Hitler's war against the Jews when the leaders of the world
translation.it: della guerra di Hitler contro gli ebrei quando i leader del mondo

translation.en: were already fully aware of all the details of Auschwitz.
translation.it: conoscevano già la situazione di Auschwitz in dettaglio.

translation.en: When we came to Auschwitz,
translation.it: Quando arrivammo ad Auschwitz,

translation.en: it was during the Final Solution,
translation.it: la Soluzione Finale era in pieno svolgimento

translation.en: when he just was desperate already.
translation.it: e la sua situazione era già disperata.

translation.en: He was losing the war. Hitler was losing the war,
translation.it: Stava perdendo la guerra. Hitler stava perdendo la guerra.

translation.en: but he was not going to lose the war against the Jews.
translation.it: Ma non avrebbe perso la guerra contro gli ebrei.

translation.en: The sadism, the cruelty,
translation.it: Il sadismo, la crudeltà,

translation.en: the irrationality of the German and Hungarian Nazis,
translation.it: l'irrazionalità dei nazisti tedeschi e ungheresi

translation.en: of killing the remaining Jewish population when the war was all over,
translation.it: nell'uccidere la popolazione ebrea rimasta quando la guerra era già finita,

translation.en: when they could have gained brownie points
translation.it: quando avrebbero potuto guadagnare punti

translation.en: by being more civilized vis-à-vis these people,
translation.it: mostrandosi più civili nei confronti di queste persone,

translation.en: was really not present because their hatred was so blind.
translation.it: ma non lo fecero, perché il loro era un odio cieco.

translation.en: [Randolph Braham] The Nazis diverted trains and other transportation means
translation.it: I nazisti dirottarono treni e altri mezzi di trasporto

translation.en: useful to the Germans
translation.it: utili ai tedeschi

translation.en: for purposes of deporting Jews,
translation.it: per deportare gli ebrei

translation.en: to complete the Final Solution program.
translation.it: e portare a termine la Soluzione Finale.

translation.en: While I was in Auschwitz,
translation.it: Quando ero ad Auschwitz,

translation.en: the transports were coming in two, three transports a day,
translation.it: arrivavano due, tre convogli al giorno.

translation.en: with thousands of people in it.
translation.it: Con migliaia di persone.

translation.en: [Randolph Braham] Within less than six weeks,
translation.it: In meno di sei settimane,

translation.en: more than 438,000 Hungarian Jews
translation.it: più di 438.000 ebrei ungheresi

translation.en: were deported to Auschwitz.
translation.it: furono deportati ad Auschwitz.

translation.en: The gas chambers, the crematoria, could not cope.
translation.it: Le camere a gas e i crematori non bastavano.

translation.en: The SS had to dig special pits
translation.it: Le SS dovevano scavare fosse speciali

translation.en: to burn the bodies,
translation.it: in cui bruciare i corpi,

translation.en: using the Jews' own fat as fuel.
translation.it: usando il grasso degli stessi ebrei come combustibile.

translation.en: I saw how they were throwing people into these fire pits.
translation.it: Ho visto come buttavano la gente in queste fosse di fuoco.

translation.en: And I said to myself, "Something is wrong with me. My mind is going."
translation.it: E pensai che non stessi bene, che stessi perdendo la testa.

translation.en: I couldn't be seeing this.
translation.it: Non poteva essere reale.

translation.en: [in German] The mass graves were
translation.it: Le fosse comuni misuravano

translation.en: about eight by ten or ten by ten meters wide.
translation.it: circa otto metri per dieci, o dieci per dieci.

translation.en: Wood was piled on the bottom and set on fire.
translation.it: E sul fondo veniva accatastato del legno e poi dato alle fiamme.

translation.en: Then the bodies were thrown over the fire. That was it.
translation.it: E sul fondo veniva accatastato del legno e poi dato alle fiamme. Poi i corpi venivano gettati sul fuoco.

translation.en: If the fat burned, then the grave was working.
translation.it: Se il grasso bruciava, allora la fossa funzionava.

translation.en: Then more and more bodies were thrown into it.
translation.it: E ci venivano gettati sempre più corpi.

translation.en: That simple.
translation.it: Semplice.

translation.en: [Alice Lok Cahana] What vast landscape you are seeing here.
translation.it: Che vasto paesaggio si vede da qui.

translation.en: How could people, normal people, go back
translation.it: Come poteva la gente, la gente normale, tornare indietro…

translation.en: after working here,
translation.it: dopo aver lavorato qui?

translation.en: or planned this, okay?
translation.it: O averlo persino pianificato?

translation.en: Somebody had to plan it.
translation.it: Qualcuno doveva averlo pianificato.

translation.en: Somebody had to be an engineer.
translation.it: Qualcuno ne era stato il realizzatore.

translation.en: Somebody had to really put on a map, this kind of efficiency.
translation.it: Qualcuno aveva davvero dovuto pianificare tanta efficienza.

translation.en: But the whole time I was in the camp, through the experiment,
translation.it: Per tutto il tempo che rimasi al campo, durante gli esperimenti,

translation.en: every time I was selected, I swallowed the diamonds.
translation.it: ogni volta che venivo scelta, inghiottivo i diamanti.

translation.en: So, every time I swallowed them, I had to find them again.
translation.it: E ogni volta che li ingoiavo, poi dovevo ritrovarli.

translation.en: We were allowed to go to the latrine once a day,
translation.it: Potevamo usare la latrina una volta al giorno,

translation.en: and I never sat on the hole because I had to go and find my diamonds.
translation.it: ma io non mi sedevo mai sul buco perché dovevo recuperare i miei diamanti.

translation.en: And when the SS woman walked by the door, and she saw me in the corner…
translation.it: E quando passò una donna delle SS e dalla porta mi vide nell'angolino…

translation.en: I already had the diamonds in hand. Usually I was waiting until…
translation.it: Io avevo già i diamanti in mano. Di solito aspettavo…

translation.en: On the way back, I would rinse them off, like in the mud,
translation.it: Rientrando, di solito li sciacquavo, tipo nel fango,

translation.en: or if there was no mud,
translation.it: o se non c'era fango,

translation.en: in the soup that we were going to get next,
translation.it: nella zuppa che ci avrebbero dato dopo,

translation.en: but I had no time, and I had to swallow them.
translation.it: ma non ebbi il tempo e dovetti ingoiarli.

translation.en: My God, this is the latrine.
translation.it: Mio Dio, questa è la latrina.

translation.en: Oh my God.
translation.it: Oh, mio Dio.

translation.en: At this place, I was with my sister,
translation.it: Una volta ero qui, con mia sorella,

translation.en: with Edith next to me.
translation.it: con Edith accanto a me.

translation.en: And so Edith whispers to me and says,
translation.it: Edith mi sussurrò:

translation.en: "It's almost Shabbat. It's Friday. It's almost Shabbat."
translation.it: "È quasi Shabbat." Era venerdì. "È quasi Shabbat."

translation.en: How we used to celebrate Shabbat in our house,
translation.it: A casa celebravamo lo Shabbat

translation.en: with food and with singing and with praying
translation.it: mangiando, cantando, pregando

translation.en: and, you know, lighting the candle.
translation.it: e accendevamo le candele.

translation.en: And I told her, "Why don't we celebrate inside, in the latrine?"
translation.it: E io le dissi: "Perché non lo celebriamo qui dentro, nella latrina?"

translation.en: We ran back to the end, and we started to make our Shabbat ceremony,
translation.it: A corsa andammo fino in fondo e iniziammo la cerimonia,

translation.en: and we started to sing.
translation.it: e ci mettemmo a cantare:

translation.en: And as we sang the melody,
translation.it: E mentre cantavamo questa melodia,

translation.en: other children came around us and started to sing with us.
translation.it: si avvicinarono altri bambini e iniziarono a cantare con noi.

translation.en: Somebody was from Holland. Somebody was from Germany.
translation.it: Chi veniva dall'Olanda. Chi dalla Germania.

translation.en: Somebody was from Hungary, Czechoslovakia. All thrown together.
translation.it: Chi dall'Ungheria, dalla Cecoslovacchia. Tutti riuniti.

translation.en: And suddenly, the Hebrew songs, the prayers, the Shabbat,
translation.it: E all'improvviso, le canzoni ebraiche, le preghiere, lo Shabbat,

translation.en: united us in the latrine of Auschwitz.
translation.it: ci unirono nella latrina di Auschwitz.

translation.en: [Irene Zisblatt] People couldn't endure all this pain,
translation.it: La gente non poteva sopportare questo dolore,

translation.en: the conditions and the hunger and the lice.
translation.it: le condizioni, la fame e i pidocchi.

translation.en: The lice were, like, as big as my pinky nail,
translation.it: I pidocchi erano grandi come l'unghia del mio mignolo,

translation.en: embedded into our bodies.
translation.it: e li avevamo dappertutto addosso

translation.en: And we were sore from scratching and infections.
translation.it: e provavamo dolore a furia di grattarci e per le infezioni.

translation.en: And so, when the electricity went on,
translation.it: E così, quando attivavano la corrente,

translation.en: they ran to the barbed wire to commit suicide.
translation.it: molti si lanciavano contro il filo spinato elettrico per uccidersi.

translation.en: Then they punished us. For every man that ran to the wire,
translation.it: Poi ci punivano. Per ogni uomo che si suicidava,

translation.en: they took 100 inmates,
translation.it: prendevano 100 prigionieri

translation.en: and they killed them in front of everybody as an example.
translation.it: e li uccidevano davanti a tutti come dimostrazione.

translation.en: They didn't even let us die when we wanted.
translation.it: Non ci lasciavano neanche morire quando volevamo.

translation.en: And then I thought of something.
translation.it: Allora pensai una cosa.

translation.en: They took away my parents.
translation.it: Mi avevano tolto i genitori.

translation.en: They took away my identity.
translation.it: Mi avevano tolto la mia identità.

translation.en: They took away my siblings.
translation.it: Mi avevano tolto i miei fratelli.

translation.en: They took away my possessions.
translation.it: Mi avevano tolto le mie cose.

translation.en: There is something that they want from me.
translation.it: C'è qualcosa che vogliono da me.

translation.en: And then I thought of my soul.
translation.it: E ho pensato alla mia anima.

translation.en: And I said, "They're not gonna take my soul."
translation.it: E dissi: "Non me la prenderanno".

translation.en: And I decided right then and there,
translation.it: Fu a quel punto che decisi

translation.en: "I'm going to get up from this mud, and I'm going to fight
translation.it: che mi sarei alzata da quel fango e avrei combattuto,

translation.en: because I'm not going to become ashes."
translation.it: perché non sarei diventata cenere.

translation.en: [Renee Firestone] When we arrived to Auschwitz,
translation.it: Quando arrivammo ad Auschwitz,

translation.en: thousands and thousands of people were cremated every day.
translation.it: ogni giorno venivano cremate migliaia e migliaia di persone.

translation.en: The Nazis used Jewish inmates,
translation.it: I nazisti usavano i prigionieri ebrei,

translation.en: a special Sonderkommando,
translation.it: un Sonderkommando speciale,

translation.en: to remove the bodies from the gas chambers
translation.it: per rimuovere i corpi dalle camere a gas

translation.en: and take the bodies into the crematoria.
translation.it: e portarli nei crematori.

translation.en: As far as I know, there is only four of us
translation.it: Per quanto ne so, siamo rimasti solo in quattro

translation.en: that worked in the Sonderkommando alive today.
translation.it: di quelli che lavoravano nel Sonderkommando.

translation.en: And we are the only eyewitness
translation.it: E siamo gli unici testimoni oculari

translation.en: that saw the whole thing from A to Z.
translation.it: che hanno visto tutto dalla A alla Z,

translation.en: How the Final Solution was done.
translation.it: di come venne portata avanti la Soluzione Finale.

translation.en: I'm Jewish, from Greece.
translation.it: Sono ebreo, vengo dalla Grecia,

translation.en: And I lived in Greece until the time they took me to concentration camp.
translation.it: e ho vissuto in Grecia fino a quando mi portarono al campo di concentramento.

translation.en: The first week of April 1944,
translation.it: La prima settimana di aprile del 1944

translation.en: I arrived in Auschwitz.
translation.it: arrivai ad Auschwitz.

translation.en: They selected some of the Greeks to go to work in crematorium.
translation.it: Selezionarono alcuni greci da impiegare nel crematorio.

translation.en: Now is my first day there.
translation.it: Era il mio primo giorno.

translation.en: I don't know what was going on.
translation.it: Non sapevo cosa stava succedendo.

translation.en: I saw 2,500 people, all naked,
translation.it: Vidi 2.500 persone, tutte nude,

translation.en: go into the big chamber, which eventually…
translation.it: entrare in una grande stanza, che alla fine

translation.en: They take only 500 people. They were putting in 2,500 people.
translation.it: poteva contenere al massimo 500 persone. Ce ne mettevano 2.500.

translation.en: So nobody could do anything but stand by their children.
translation.it: Quindi non potevano far altro che stare accanto ai propri figli.

translation.en: And 15 minutes later, you know, after they close the chambers,
translation.it: E 15 minuti dopo, dopo aver chiuso le stanze,

translation.en: and the SS threw the gas from these four openings,
translation.it: le SS iniettarono gas da quattro fessure,

translation.en: you know, they open up.
translation.it: le SS iniettarono gas da quattro fessure, e quando aprirono,

translation.en: What did I see? I see the people I saw 15 minutes ago.
translation.it: che cosa vidi? Le persone che avevo visto 15 minuti prima.

translation.en: I see them all dead, standing up, with their children black and blue.
translation.it: Erano tutti morti, in piedi, coi loro figli, cianotici.

translation.en: And I said to myself, "What's going on? What's going on here?"
translation.it: E pensai: "Ma che sta succedendo qui?"

translation.en: There was a Polish guy that was there before,
translation.it: A un polacco che lavorava lì da prima

translation.en: and I said, "Where is God?"
translation.it: chiesi: "Dov'è Dio?"

translation.en: He said, "God, God is where you have your strength."
translation.it: Mi rispose: "Dio è laddove hai la forza".

translation.en: There were four crematoriums, you know, and they were working 24 hours.
translation.it: C'erano quattro crematori in tutto, e funzionavano 24 ore su 24.

translation.en: And there were a lot of big shots from Berlin
translation.it: E molti pezzi grossi da Berlino

translation.en: coming and watching how the Jews were dying.
translation.it: venivano a vedere come morivano gli ebrei.

translation.en: You know, there was a hole, in the, you know, hermetically closed,
translation.it: Insomma, c'era un buco, chiuso ermeticamente,

translation.en: and they were looking there how the Jewish people were dying.
translation.it: attraverso cui guardavano come morivano gli ebrei.

translation.en: Takes two to four minutes. Depends where you are.
translation.it: Ci vogliono dai due ai quattro minuti. A seconda di dov'eri.

translation.en: A lot of people think that we, working in the Sonderkommando,
translation.it: Molte persone pensano che noi che lavoravamo nel Sonderkommando

translation.en: we were guilty of something because we were doing such kind of work.
translation.it: fossimo colpevoli di qualcosa, perché facevamo quel tipo di lavoro.

translation.en: But ourselves, you know, we couldn't get out of it.
translation.it: Ma noi stessi non potevamo evitarlo.

translation.en: If you don't do whatever they ask you to do, they kill you right away.
translation.it: Se non facevi come ti dicevano, ti uccidevano subito.

translation.en: One time I had two friends of mine, very close friends of mine.
translation.it: Una volta arrivarono due miei amici. Due miei carissimi amici.

translation.en: They came in, you know. Their names were the Venezias.
translation.it: Entrarono. Di cognome facevano Venezia.

translation.en: And… [clear throat] …I told them right away
translation.it: E li informai subito

translation.en: that they were going to die.
translation.it: che sarebbero morti.

translation.en: And they asked for food, and whatever I had, I gave them to eat,
translation.it: Chiesero del cibo, e detti loro tutto ciò che avevo,

translation.en: and I told them exactly where to keep themselves,
translation.it: e indicai loro esattamente dove avrebbero dovuto mettersi,

translation.en: where the openings were, so they can die fast.
translation.it: dove erano le fessure, affinché potessero morire in fretta,

translation.en: And after they were through, I took them out, and I washed them,
translation.it: e dopo che ebbero finito, li tirai fuori, li lavai

translation.en: and I put them in the oven to be burned.
translation.it: e li misi nel forno per essere bruciati.

translation.en: [Tom Lantos] We could hear the artillery moving closer and closer.
translation.it: Sentivamo l'artiglieria avvicinarsi sempre di più.

translation.en: And Budapest was the battlefield
translation.it: E Budapest era il campo di battaglia

translation.en: between the Germans and the Soviet Army.
translation.it: tra i tedeschi e l'esercito sovietico.

translation.en: And although we knew it would be weeks
translation.it: E pur sapendo che di lì a poche settimane

translation.en: before the Soviet Army would hopefully liberate the remaining Jews,
translation.it: l'esercito sovietico avrebbe liberato gli ebrei rimasti,

translation.en: we knew that lots of hardships were still ahead.
translation.it: sapevamo che davanti a noi c'erano ancora molte difficoltà.

translation.en: [Alice Lok Cahana] In Auschwitz, after Christmas,
translation.it: Ad Auschwitz, dopo Natale,

translation.en: we heard more and more the bombing came closer and closer.
translation.it: sentivamo che i bombardamenti erano sempre più vicini.

translation.en: The Nazis didn't want anybody to get liberated,
translation.it: I nazisti non volevano che venisse liberato qualcuno,

translation.en: so they were herding the people away from the camp.
translation.it: e iniziarono a portare via la gente dal campo.

translation.en: [Randolph Braham] The death march was in winter.
translation.it: La marcia della morte avvenne d'inverno.

translation.en: Those who could not keep pace were simply shot by the wayside.
translation.it: Chi non riusciva a tenere il passo, veniva fucilato.

translation.en: If anybody, anybody tries to run away
translation.it: Se qualcuno cercava di scappare,

translation.en: or do anything that is not permitted, will be shot on the spot.
translation.it: o fare qualcosa che fosse vietato, veniva fucilato sul posto.

translation.en: There were three of us friends that were together up to that point.
translation.it: Eravamo tre amici ed eravamo rimasti insieme fino a quel momento.

translation.en: But we swore that we would sacrifice each other's life for each other.
translation.it: Ma giurammo che saremmo morti l'uno per l'altro.

translation.en: We would never let each other down.
translation.it: Non ci saremmo mai divisi.

translation.en: Kids. You know, we had this sort of a dream that will be possible.
translation.it: Eravamo ragazzini, sognavamo che sarebbe stato possibile.

translation.en: One of the three had an injury in his knee and had gangrene,
translation.it: Uno dei tre aveva una ferita al ginocchio e una cancrena
